author: Simon Difford
description: None of the ingredients come from Alabama and the drink is served too long to slam. However, it's a good, rhythmic, rhyming name, if a little naff these days.
name: Alabama Slammer (straight-up)
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
